title: (PUSHING PAT) Gold Mid  LF flex/duo
body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Vortelix

Looking to push to plat in solo/duo queue
My preferred champs are Orianna, Malzahar, Annie and Talon.
{{champion:61}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:91}} 

Prefer a jungle/top main for duos
Will also join any flex team as mid lane

Add me if you're interested
Summoner: Vortelix
